Revolutionise expense management with the seamless Gmail integration using Finnoto.Effortlessly view, create, and track expenses directly in your Gmail interface for a streamlined workflow.

Key Features:

View and Create Expenses:
Access and create detailed expense entries directly in Gmail for seamless expense management.
Check Expense Status:
Track expense status in your email interface, staying informed about progress and approvals.
Automatic Receipt Attachment:
Automated receipt attachment for seamless expense management. No more manual uploads enhancing overall efficiency.
Policy Checks in Gmail:
Handle policy checks in your Gmail inbox with Finnoto, streamlining compliance procedures for direct and efficient resolution.

Need assistance or have questions about Finnoto? Feel free to email us at support@finnoto.com. We're here to help!
